text: Arrowtown (MƒÅori: Haehaenui) is a historic town in the Queenstown-Lakes District in the South Island, New Zealand. It is 19.5 kilometers east of Queenstown and is located near State Highway 6 and Lake Hayes. It has well preserved buildings dating back to European and Chinese goldminers. == References == Category:Towns in Otago Category:Queenstown-Lakes District
title: Arrowtown
